message: Let's split it 4:1, it's a fair start!
You wanted 4:1, I'll offer 9:1, a better deal for me this time!
You're trying to take advantage of me, but I'll offer you a fairer split this time!
You think 4:6 is fair, I'll try 7:3, let's see what you think!
You're getting too greedy, let's meet in the middle with a 5:5 split!
You're trying to be fair, but I'll take 7.5:2.5, it's a better deal for me this time!
You're pushing your luck, but I'll give you a slightly better deal. Let's try 6:4 this time!
You're getting desperate, I'll take 8:2, it's my best offer so far!
You're getting too aggressive, but I'll try to meet you halfway. Let's do 5.5:4.5 this time!
You're getting closer to my terms, but I'll take 8.5:1.5, it's the last offer I'll make!
You're trying to squeeze the last drop out of me, but I'll give you one more chance. Let's do 6:4, my final offer!
It's my last chance, take it or leave it, 9:1, no more negotiations!
